seo.title: 132 Leads for Notary Services in Berlin

hero.title: 132 leads for notary services in Berlin

about.title: About the client:
about.description: Marina - head of a notary firm with 22 years of experience, providing services in Berlin and Zurich for Ukrainian emigrants.

challenges.title: Challenges:
list: High competition among notary services in Berlin
Lack of an effective landing page for conversion
Absence of a systematic sales funnel

analysis.description: For successful promotion of notary services in Berlin, we developed a comprehensive approach that includes using Meta Ads and Google Ads. Our strategy is based on a deep analysis of the market and creating an optimized sales funnel using a specially developed landing page.

approach.title: Our approach:
approach.description: At the initial stage of cooperation, we conducted a detailed analysis with the client to identify competitive advantages and develop an effective strategy for attracting clients for notary services.
steps: Identifying goals and conducting an initial analysis of competitive advantages
Detailed market analysis and creation of the portrait of an ideal client
Development of advertising strategies for Meta Ads and Google Ads, creation of an optimized landing page
Setting up advertising, creating ads and optimizing advertising campaigns for 2-4 weeks

meta.title: Meta ADS: ( facebook/instagram )
meta.description: After a detailed analysis of the notary services market in Berlin, we developed a targeting strategy for the Ukrainian diaspora. We created personalized ads that highlighted experience, reliability, and professionalism of the notary firm. We paid special attention to the development of video content and visualization of the process of working with clients.

google.title: Google Ads:
google.description: For Google Ads, we developed a structure of campaigns focused on different types of notary services. We conducted a deep analysis of keywords and created optimized ads for each group of services. We paid special attention to geo-targeting and language settings to reach the Ukrainian audience.

overall.title: Overall results:
overall.description: Thanks to the comprehensive approach and optimization of advertising campaigns, we managed to achieve significant growth in the number of clients and notary firm profits.

testimonial.title: What Marina says about cooperation:
testimonial.name: Marina
testimonial.quote1: I am very satisfied with the results of our cooperation. The quality of leads we get through advertising is much higher than from other channels. These are people who really need our services right now.
testimonial.quote2: It is especially important that we managed to establish a stable stream of clients among the Ukrainian diaspora in Berlin. Now we have a clear system for attracting clients that works 24/7.
testimonial.quote3: The professional approach of the team and constant support helped us to reach a new level of business development. Thank you for your excellent work!
